name: Wholesale Order Form
description:
Aarcade's Big Cartel Wholesale Order Form provides an easy to install page template that allows your customers to quickly place bulk product orders. With the built in password protection enabled, you can ensure that only approved customers have access to the form. The form works by dynamically tallying your customer's order as they enter quantities. When their order is complete, all items are added to their cart in just one click. Your nominated discount is applied automatically to the form and at the cart page. Checkout is then per the standard process, i.e. the customer can select shipping destination or modify quantities (as applicable for your shop and form settings) before checking out. Alternatively you can follow our instructions for activating order by email so that you can invoice your wholesale customer using your own system (for net 30 and other special payment terms).

Works With Any Theme

Aarcade's Big Cartel Wholesale Order Form has been developed to work on all Big Cartel themes, not just Aarcade made themes. However, with an Aarcade theme (excluding Lite), you can take advantage of extended category controls to hide products from the public and make them only available to your wholesale customers. You will also have the option of hiding the link to your Wholesale Order Form using Aarcade's navigation control. [col]

Features

  • Product category filter interface allows easier browsing of products.
  • Product image viewer displays all images for each product in a pop-up gallery.
  • Product description expand / collapse.
  • Total order is tallied as quantities are entered.
  • Invalid quantity values are automatically corrected.
  • Stock level check as quantities are entered. If quantity exceeds stock level, a warning is displayed and the quantity is corrected to match the available stock level.
  • Reset order link.
  • Review order link.
  • Print order link with print-specific formatting.
  • Responsive layout compatible format.

In-Built Options

  • Editable form intro, outro and note text.
  • Show / hide sold out products.
  • Show / hide coming soon products.
  • Enable / disable stock level control.
  • Set a minimum order value.
  • Set product order to standard or group and order by category.
  • Include or exclude specific product categories.
  • Show / hide associated product category list for each product.
  • Password protect form.
  • Editable message and account request link for password sign in.
  • Easily show / hide the "Made With Aarcade" link.
  • Multiple pop-up image viewer style options.
[col]

Wholesale Item Pricing

The wholesale order form will display your standard product pricing by default. To offer wholesale specific pricing you can do one or more of the following:
  1. Create a Big Cartel percentage discount code (i.e. your wholesale discount to be applied to all products in the form). Your form will then:
    • Display standard pricing with a line-through, e.g. $20.00
    • Display item pricing and totals at discounted values.
    • Automatically (in the background) attempt to activate the cart discount code using the password phrase (if set).
    • If a password phrase is not set, or the discount code is different to the password phrase, prompt the user for their discount code before proceeding to the cart.
  2. If you have different customer groups with different percentage discounts, you can install the wholesale form multiple times in the same shop and set a different log in password and percentage discount for each form.
  3. If you have more complicated wholesale pricing (not just a blanket percentage discount), get per-product control over product details, pricing and shipping with one of the following:
    1. Password protect the form and create hidden products for wholesale only (requires an Aarcade standard theme).
    2. Create a new Big Cartel shop that is dedicated to your wholesale products and use the password protected form for all orders.
[col]

Purchase Wholesale Order Form

[preview url="http://theme.aarcadethemes.com/preview/uptown/01/wholesale-orders.html"]

name: Domain & Email For Big Cartel
description:
Have Aarcade set up and manage the technical stuff for you. Get your own domain name and email without any fuss.

Custom Domains can be applied to any Platinum+ Big Cartel account, with any theme and at any time.

Why Get A Custom Domain?

A custom domain strengthens your identity / brand, improves your SEO and makes your address more visible and memorable.

Low Cost & Flexible

Human-managed domain and email set up and continued maintenance for the cost of a cup of coffee per month ($3.50 per month = $42 per year). We don't lock you in to long contracts. We have just one fixed low cost, once per year, that you can cancel easily and at any time. If you stop using Big Cartel, we can still keep your domain and email working and incorporate other apps - like Tumblr, Shopify, etc. - for as long as you want. If you ever choose to move your Aarcade service, we'll help you transfer your domain and email to your new preferred provider - no questions asked.

Registration Included

If you don't have a domain name, choose a new name and we'll take care of the rest (including registration*). - or - If you've already registered a domain, we work with your current registrar or you can transfer your domain* to us and cancel your current registration cost.

Whichever option suits you, it's all included in our service at no extra cost.

* Domain registration or transfer options are available for .com, .net, .org and .us domains only. If you have a domain with a different extension, you simply maintain your current registration and point your domain to Aarcade's servers. In this way Aarcade's Domain & Email service will work with any domain.

Everything At Your Domain

Get your Big Cartel shop at www.your-domain-name.com Aarcade manages setup and maintenance of your domain so it does exactly what you need. There's no control panels or accounts to maintain, simply contact us whenever you need another web app incorporated, a custom domain record set up or a new email account created and we do the technical stuff for you.

Personalised, Professional Email

Includes up to 10 @your-domain-name.com professional email accounts

  • 1 GB storage per inbox / account
  • 50MB per message attachment capability
  • spam & virus protection
  • web access (mobile friendly)
  • email filtering & forwarding tools
  • contact, calendar and task management tools
  • no advertising
  • POP, IMAP & SMTP (universally compatible)
Aarcade creates and hosts your email accounts for you, as you need them, and provides you with easy to follow instructions for accessing your email from anywhere via webmail, desktop, mobile device or your existing Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc. email controls.

name: Big Cartel Theme Installation
description:
If the Big Cartel theme installation instructions seem a little overwhelming, or you just don't have the time to work through them, you can get Aarcade to install your theme for you. Aarcade's Big Cartel Theme Installation covers the installation of one Aarcade-made Big Cartel theme only and is limited to the initial installation work. For more information, refer to our FAQ article What is included in Aarcade’s Big Cartel theme installation service? After you purchase a Big Cartel Theme Installation an Aarcade team member will get in touch with you to obtain your store details and schedule your installation.
  • Please note:
  • Allow up to two business days for Aarcade to process your order before contacting you.
  • You will need to provide a valid transaction ID for an Aarcade theme purchased within the last 12 months.
  • This service is for themes only. For installation of templates and extras, please refer to Can Aarcade install my page template (or other Extra items) for me?

name: Big Cartel Theme Upgrade
description:
Upgrade your theme to the latest Aarcade version.
  • Please note:
  • Allow up to two business days for Aarcade to process your order before contacting you.
  • Optional: You will be given the opportunity to add installation during the upgrade process.
  • For more information on upgrading your theme, please refer to How do I upgrade my theme?
